segments.text: I can't believe the sink is overflowing right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't even glanced at it, just drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's on, but her shoe's soaked in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the boy's climbing that stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in the cookie jar already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting backâ€” that's dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, totally in on the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, contrasting the water mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open to a serene garden, so unexpected inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing away, missing all the action behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in the jar look tempting, I have to admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could go wrong so fast, it's startling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a lively family moment unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
